label: intro
text1: In this activity, you're going to help me complete some sentences.

label: ins
text1: Choose the best option to fill in the blank.

label: surveyPractice
text1: Remember, your job is to choose the right word that fills in the blank.

label: surveyPostPractice
text1: Now you're ready to try on your own. Try your best to choose the word that completes the sentence.

label: break4
header1: You are an expert at this!

label: ending
header1: You're all done! Thank you for helping me find those words!
